title: Quantum Kramers-Wannier Duality And Its Topology
abstract: We show for any oriented surface, possibly with a boundary, how to generalize Kramers-Wannier duality to the world of quantum groups. The generalization is motivated by quantization of Poisson-Lie T-duality from the string theory. Cohomologies with quantum coefficients are defined for surfaces and their meaning is revealed. They are functorial with respect to some glueing operations and connected with q-invariants of 3-folds.
